title: Panoramic View of Cincinnati's Public Landing

creator.publisher: The Family Circle and Parlor Annual

source.publication: The Family Circle and Parlor Annual

location.subject: Cincinnati's Public Landing during mid-nineteenth century

viewpoint.description: Panoramic view of the Public Landing and riverfront

artistBiography.name: William Wellstood
artistBiography.background: Born in Scotland, came to the United States with his family in 1830. Devoted himself to engraving portraits, landscapes and historical subjects, gaining notable reputation in his profession.

description: Steel engraving by William Wellstood showing a panoramic view of Cincinnati's Public Landing during the mid-nineteenth century. This detailed riverfront scene captures the bustling commercial activity and steamboat traffic that made Cincinnati a major inland port during the 1840s.
